data.text: @EOlivius I always forget just how much work these research applications are! They take FOREVER.

@HedstromJenny Great! I still have not done my first after Covid run. I definitely could, but kids off from school + husband has Covid now + research application due 😬 definitely a backlash to the half marathon PR plan! 😆
@gillian_cornish Well I wasn’t very fast to be honest 😂 but the sun helped!
@HedstromJenny Good on you! I'm still not up to the challenge!
@HedstromJenny I am somewhere between, best of wishes for the partner.
@OscarPolitical It was surprisingly easy! But my partner has not been able to get back into running + gets exhausted by walking, despite not being very ill so 🤷‍♀️ Weird indeed.
@HedstromJenny was it tough? I had really struggled with my stamina after omicron.
